description: This table stores the data related to the follow up done on an Advanced Beneficiary Notice (ABN).

columns.name: NOTE_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of the contact.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the note (HNO) record that contains the Advance Beneficiary Notice (ABN) information.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: ABN_FLUP_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the user who did the follow up on this ABN

columns.name: ABN_FOLLOW_UP_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant at which the follow up was done.

columns.name: ABN_FLUP_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the status of the Advance Beneficiary Notice (ABN) follow-up.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not Started


Provider Contacted


Review Complete: ABN Resolved


Review Complete: ABN Required


Patient Contacted


Follow-Up Complete


Review Needed: ABN Changed
